## üìã Immediate Actions Required

### 1. Review Detection Report
- [ ] Read `WHATSAPP_WATCH_REPORT.md` for full details

### 2. Analyze Changes
- [ ] Clone the detected branch (if applicable)

### 3. Update Knowledge Base
- [ ] Run research pipeline on detected changes

- [ ] Add new step types if introduced
- [ ] Update anti-patterns if needed

### 4. Update Schemas
- [ ] Review `library/schemas/whatsapp/whatsapp_tools.json`
- [ ] Update tool definitions based on actual implementation
- [ ] Adjust safety constraints if API differs
- [ ] Update DOM selectors with actual values

### 5. Test Integration
- [ ] Test MCP server compatibility
- [ ] Validate workflow templates
- [ ] Update safety guidelines based on actual limits
- [ ] Test with real WhatsApp Web instance

### 6. Update Documentation
- [ ] Change status from "anticipatory" to "in-development"
- [ ] Update WHATSAPP_INTEGRATION_READINESS.md
- [ ] Add actual BrowserOS version/commit references
- [ ] Update timeline expectations
